message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with truth discovery in categorical data, which is a common problem in databases (cs.DB) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of hierarchical structures to estimate the trustworthiness of sources and infer truths suggests a connection to information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the use of crowdsourcing to refine the results of truth discovery suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
